intro: Spooky Fun for Little Ghouls & Boos!
description:
Get ready for a ghoulishly good time with Pumpkin Smash, the Halloween arcade adventure perfect for preschoolers!

Based on the classic carnival game, little ones will love whacking and smashing playful pumpkins as they pop up from their spooky hiding spots. Tap the right button in time to score points and race to be the first to reach 1000! But watch out – a tricky skull might appear! Only smash the friendly pumpkins to keep your score climbing.

With three gentle difficulty modes and both single-player and two-player options, Pumpkin Smash is the perfect first video game for young players.

Grab your virtual mallet and join the family-friendly Halloween party today!

• Perfect for Preschoolers: Simple, intuitive gameplay designed for young players.
• Spooky & Sweet: A festive Halloween theme with friendly graphics and no scary surprises.
• Two Game Modes: Play against the computer or challenge a sibling or parent in versus mode!
• Three Gentle Difficulties: Adjust the challenge to perfectly match your child's skill level.
• Develops Skills: A fun way to practice timing, coordination, and quick thinking.
